ConnectionStrings.DefaultConnection: Server=your_db_server; Database=your_db_name; User ID=your_db_user; Password=your_db_password; Connect Timeout=30; Encrypt=True; Trust Server Certificate=True; Application Intent=ReadWrite; Multi Subnet Failover=False
ConnectionStrings.IdentityConnection: Server=your_db_server; Database=your_identity_db_name; User ID=your_db_user; Password=your_db_password; Connect Timeout=30; Encrypt=True; Trust Server Certificate=True; Application Intent=ReadWrite; Multi Subnet Failover=False
